attributes.action: Make sure that the parents and social workers who failed baby p to be punished for life and not given any form of parole or release.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I demand the government take action against the parents to make sure these people never set foot in the free world again. I also demand the goverment take action against the social services that failed baby p and the doctors who also failed baby p. strip them of the licenses.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
